attributes.action: Ban the Film ''Innocence of Muslims'' everywhere
attributes.additional_details: The film 'innocence of Muslims' is a derogatory and misleading film which has caused world wide outrage amongst the muslim community.Consequently the film has lead to the death of innocent individuals and must be banned to prevent further casualities and to help restore muslim - western relations.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the British Board of Film Classification (BBFC).
